title: Believe it or not, AI can help brands connect with customers in an empathetic way
content:
Brands are beginning to see the need to incorporate emotional intelligence into the customer experience. It is crucial to implement automation in the sales, marketing and customer service industry while also finding ways to personalize an experience for a customer using empathy.
